page.title: 17A DAY IN THE LIFE OF TRISTAN
page.content: My name is Tristan,I am 12 years old and I live in Shandon near Rhu.This timetable shows what I did yesterday. 7.20a.m._ Wakened by Mum. 8.50a.m._Catch school bus. 9.10a.m._School bell rings. 9.15_10.25a.m._Maths activities. 10.25_10.35a.m._"Tuck Time"milk/crisps 10.35_10.50a.m._Interval. 10.55_12.20p.m._English activities. 12.20_1.20p.m._Eat packed lunch in dinner hall then out to play football. 1.20_2.45p.m._"Project work _art/craft activities related to this term"s project based on the novel "Th Lotus Caves"by John Christopher. 2.45p.m._Interval. 3.00_3.40p.m._Musical activities. 4.00p.m._Arrive home,change before going out to play with my friend Ben. 6.00p.m._Have dinner then to football training at 7.30p.m.Bed at 9.00p.m.
